amendment.description: At the end of subtitle B of title XII of division A of the bill, add the following: SEC. 12xx. PROHIBITION ON AVAILABILITY OF FUNDS FOR ASSISTANCE FOR PAKISTAN. Notwithstanding any other provision of this Act, none of the funds authorized to be appropriated by this Act may be used to provide assistance for Pakistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-485 to prohibit the availability of funds for assistance to Pakistan in fiscal year 2013.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 335 (Roll no. 263).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 335 (Roll no. 263).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
